title: Peekaboo Kids - Free Kids Game APK for Android - Free download and software reviews - CNET Download
text: A fun and educational game for kids 1-3 years old! - A game for kids 1-3 years old!Welcome to Peekaboo Kids - a fun and educational game for children between the ages 1-3 years! In this English kids game you will get to meet a number of exciting animals, vehicles and music instruments, such as lion, cow, airplane and guitar.Peekaboo Kids is especially created for small children and includes over 80 fun animations and sound effects. When you click on an animal or a vehicle it gets animated and its special sound is played, for example a dog barking. An English voice will reveal the name of the animal or car displayed.Peekaboo Kids is a free game for kids 1, 2 or 3 years old. The game is divided into 6 different categories of animals and cars:- The Farm- The Forest- The Savannah- The Garage- The Music Scene- Guess the Item The interface is well defined, interactive and excellently designed to suit kids and toddlers 1 year, 2 years and 3 years old - all in English.Games for kids are a great way for the child and parent to have a fun time together, while learning about animals and cars. Toddlers quickly learn to use this application by themselves.LOTS OF DIFFERENT ANIMATIONS AND SOUNDSThis game for kids includes over 80 animations and sound effects of animals and cars. All voices are in the English language.LEARN ANOTHER LANGUAGEPeekaboo Kids includes ten languages to choose from: English, French, Russian, Italian, Spanish, German, Swedish, Norwegian, Danish and Dutch.CAREFULLY TESTEDThe app has been carefully tested by toddlers 1, 2 and 3 years old. We believe all apps for kids should be tested on children during development.KEY FEATURES- Games for kids- Animations and sounds specifically chosen for kids and toddlers- Optimized for kids 1 year, 2 years and 3 years old- Carefully tested on both phones & tablets- Animals, cars, vehicles and music instruments.- Free to download!Peekaboo Kids is brought to you by Tappy Happy, creators of highly popular apps and games for kids 1, 2 and 3 years old. All our apps and games for kids are free and in English.Content rating: Everyone
